parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~610396~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine of the instance. Set the value to **MySQL**

parameters.name: ImportId
parameters.description: The ID of the migration task.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~610394~~) operation to obtain the ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
